StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateSelec.onBoardVoterWorksheet]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @NWAID int, @BoardID int, @VoterID uniqueiden..er, @AcademicNotes varchar(500), @AcademicScore int, @PhysicalNotes varchar(500), @PhysicalScore int, @LeadershipNotes varchar(500), @LeadershipScore int, @AddtlPhysFitnessInfo varchar(500) )
AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[SELECTION_BOARD_VOTER_WORKSHEET] WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID AND BOARD_ID = @BoardID AND VOTER_ID = @VoterID) BEGIN UPDATE [mcriss].[dbo].[SELECTION_BOARD_VOTER_WORKSHEET] SET [ACADEMIC_NOTES] = @AcademicNotes ,[ACADEMIC_SCORE] = @AcademicScore ,[PHYSICAL_NOTES] = @PhysicalNotes ,[PHYSICAL_SCORE] = @PhysicalScore ,[LEADERSHIP_NOTES] = @LeadershipNotes ,[LEADERSHIP_SCORE] = @LeadershipScore ,[ADDITIONAL_PHYS_FITNESS_INFO] = @AddtlPhysFitnessInfo WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID AND BOARD_ID = @BoardID AND VOTER_ID = @VoterID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[SELECTION_BOARD_VOTER_WORKSHEET] ([WORKSHEET_ID] ,[NWA_ID] ,[BOARD_ID] ,[VOTER_ID] ,[ACADEMIC_NOTES] ,[ACADEMIC_SCORE] ,[PHYSICAL_NOTES] ,[PHYSICAL_SCORE] ,[LEADERSHIP_NOTES] ,[LEADERSHIP_SCORE] ,[ADDITIONAL_PHYS_FITNESS_INFO]) VALUES (NEWID() ,@NWAID ,@BoardID ,@VoterID ,@AcademicNotes ,@AcademicScore ,@PhysicalNotes ,@PhysicalScore ,@LeadershipNotes ,@LeadershipScore ,@AddtlPhysFitnessInfo) END
